00239 /*****************************************************************************
00240  * constants
00241  *****************************************************************************/
00242 
00243 #define PVRTEX_MIPMAP           (1<<8)          // has mip map levels
00244 #define PVRTEX_TWIDDLE          (1<<9)          // is twiddled
00245 #define PVRTEX_BUMPMAP          (1<<10)         // has normals encoded for a bump map
00246 #define PVRTEX_TILING           (1<<11)         // is bordered for tiled pvr
00247 #define PVRTEX_CUBEMAP          (1<<12)         // is a cubemap/skybox
00248 #define PVRTEX_FALSEMIPCOL      (1<<13)         //
00249 #define PVRTEX_VOLUME           (1<<14)
00250 #define PVRTEX_PIXELTYPE        0xff                    // pixel type is always in the last 16bits of the flags
00251 #define PVRTEX_IDENTIFIER       0x21525650      // the pvr identifier is the characters 'P','V','R'
00252 
00253 #define PVRTEX_V1_HEADER_SIZE 44                        // old header size was 44 for identification purposes
00254 
00255 #define PVRTC2_MIN_TEXWIDTH             16
00256 #define PVRTC2_MIN_TEXHEIGHT    8
00257 #define PVRTC4_MIN_TEXWIDTH             8
00258 #define PVRTC4_MIN_TEXHEIGHT    8
00259 #define ETC_MIN_TEXWIDTH                4
00260 #define ETC_MIN_TEXHEIGHT               4
00261 #define DXT_MIN_TEXWIDTH                4
00262 #define DXT_MIN_TEXHEIGHT               4
00263 
00264 #endif
